akn:section.akn:heading: Injury to submarine cables in efforts to save life excepted

akn:content.akn:p: § 23. Injury to submarine cables in efforts to save life excepted The provisions of sections 21 and 22 of this title shall not apply to a person who breaks or injures a cable in an effort to save the life or limb of himself or of any other person, or to save his own or any other vessel: Provided, That he takes reasonable precautions to avoid such breaking or injury. (Feb. 29, 1888, ch. 17, § 3, 25 Stat. 41.)
